inclusion.criterion: Male or female patient 18 years or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient presenting with at least one thyroid nodule with no signs of malignancy:
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Non suspicious clinically and at ultrasonography imaging
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Benign cytological diagnosis at fine needle aspiration biopsy in the last 6 months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Serum TSH and free T4 levels within the normal range
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Targeted nodule deemed to be accessible and eligible to HIFU
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of vocal cord paresis at laryngoscopy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Nodule greatest diameter between ≥10 - 20mm as measured by ultrasound
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Composition of the targeted nodule(s) : predominantly solid
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is mentally competent and has given informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Head and/or neck disease that prevents extension of neck
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known history of thyroid cancer or other malignant tumors in the neck region
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Intranodular macrocalcification inducing a shadow in the thyroid significant enough to preclude HIFU treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: A nodule next to the posterior margin of the lobe with distance <15mm
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any contraindication to the assigned analgesia/anaesthesia.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and history of neck irradiation, which are exclusion criteria.
